hero.description: Use a 'Tetris' style grid. Main hero image takes 2/3 width. Side blocks for 'Free Shipping' and 'Best Sellers'.
hero.classes: grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-12 gap-6 h-auto lg:h-[520px]

instructions_to_main_agent.general: Follow the 'Bahçem' style: Organic, clean, and user-friendly. Use the specific color palette provided. Ensure all text is in Turkish as requested.
critical_rules: Do NOT use gradients for text.
Do NOT use generic 'Inter' for headings; use 'Caveat' for a handwritten, organic feel.
Ensure the Topbar is exactly 40px height with #C8D96F background.
Ensure the Header is 100px height with white background.
Implement a 'Tetris' grid for the Hero section to break monotony.
Do NOT use transparent backgrounds for dropdowns; use solid white with shadow.
functionality: Implement a static JSON product list.
Use localStorage for Cart and Favorites.
Create a WhatsApp order link for the checkout process.

universal_guidelines.design_philosophy: Anti-AI Slop. Avoid generic, centered layouts. Use asymmetry, negative space, and organic textures.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios are met. Use semantic HTML.
universal_guidelines.motion: Add subtle hover effects to all interactive elements. Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions if possible, or CSS transitions.
